fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.util

Class AbstractDeviceListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.util.AbstractDeviceListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceListener, IcasaListener

    public class AbstractDeviceListener
extends Object
implements DeviceListener
    Empty implementation of a device listener. This is class is inteded to ease implementation of Device Listeners.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque
